function EP03_28_01()
    --.結-3A【9月第4週】「アナタのその手に救われて」
    SaveData.Title = "アナタのその手に救われて"

    --//BG：病院の廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ After Minato left for the academy, I decided to visit the hospital where Mariccho was hospitalized. ]])

    MSG([[ I had two purposes. First, to tidy up Mariccho's surroundings on behalf of busy Minato. ]])

    MSG([[ Secondly, to have Mariccho listen to this frustrating feeling that’s filling my chest right now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0433.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Hah... Coming all the way to the hospital to have the Sleeping Beauty hear my complaints, I can’t laugh at Minato anymore." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0434.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"But if Mariccho listens to me, maybe this fog in my chest will clear up a little..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ While muttering to myself to dispel my anxiety, I arrived in front of Mariccho’s hospital room. ]])

    MSG([[ When I tried to open the sliding door handle, I noticed someone’s voice coming from inside the room. ]])
    --//SE：誰かの囁く声

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0435.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Who could it be besides Minato or me...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I quietly opened the sliding door just a little and peeked inside. There was a woman standing in front of Mariccho’s bed whom I somehow recognized. ]])

    MSG([[ The woman seemed to be talking to the still sleeping Mariccho about something. ]])

    MSG([[ Eavesdropping, I barely caught what she said―― ]])
    --//SE：誰かの囁く声

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0436.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
("...Eh!? Did she just say she’s the one who cornered Mariccho?") ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0437.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
("That’s right. That person is from Yuriai Private Academy... No way.") ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Even just the bits I managed to hear sent chills down my spine. No way “she” was the culprit who pushed Mariccho to the edge. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t even imagine how shocked the naive Minato would be if he found out by accident. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_AKI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0438.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Minato mustn’t be made to suffer any further... I have to tell him myself." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I quietly left the room so as not to be noticed by "her." ]])

    MSG([[ And then headed toward Yuriai Private Academy, where Minato was waiting. ]])

    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：校門前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ Unconsciously, I walked up to the empty school gate. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s no way Akira would find me here. ]])

    MSG([[ Because I left her behind and came to Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though Akira was suffering, I prioritized everyone else at the academy. ]])

    MSG([[ I held on to a faint hope that maybe she’d chase after me. ]])

    MSG([[ Feeling so pathetic, I couldn’t help it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0721.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Akira... I’m sorry. Even though I promised long ago I’d always be on your side." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was going to listen to whatever Akira wished for. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought I could handle her depending on me no matter what. ]])

    MSG([[ But the truth was different. Leaving Akira behind like this, I finally realized my honest feelings. ]])

    MSG([[ I didn’t want to support Akira. I just wanted to be by her side. Actually, I was the one truly being supported. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0439.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
"Why are you crying? I told you to stop crying because it would ruin your makeup, didn’t I?" ]])
    --//アキラ

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0722.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Eh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I hurriedly looked up—and there was the person I wanted to see right in front of me. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0440.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Why do you look like you’ve seen a ghost? It was Minato who wanted you to come to the school festival, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0723.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"B-But this morning... you said you really didn’t want to go." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0441.wav")

【Akira】

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0442.wav")

【Akira】
"I was going to surprise everyone by secretly coming to the school festival. There’s no way cool beauty me would show such raw emotions like that, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0443.wav")

【Akira】

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")

【Erika】
"Yeah... yeah..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0444.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"W-What’s that face? You should be mad since you were tricked. Or maybe you doubt what I just said? Got something to say?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0725.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"I don’t have anything to say. Because Akira came here." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Right now, what’s true or not doesn’t matter. Because Akira came to Yuriai Private Academy like this. ]])

    MSG([[ Just that alone makes me so happy. I want to hug her right now so badly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0445.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0726.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Hm? Did something happen?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0446.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Ugh! I’ll tell you later. But first, I want to eat something." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0447.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"I actually left without eating anything... so I’m starving." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0727.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Then let’s eat while walking around the school. I also ate only a little earlier, so I’m hungry too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ And so we started walking side by side inside the school. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")

【Female student】

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0728.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"That’s my cousin Akira. She’s wearing an old relative’s uniform and came to tour Yuriai Private Academy today." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0111.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
"Oh! No wonder she’s cute, being your cousin and all." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0112.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
"Here, please share this dango together. If it’s good, please tell others about it!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0729.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Thank you very much. Akira, say thank you, okay?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0448.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Uh, ah... thank you..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0113.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
"So cute! Here’s an extra dango for you!" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira held dango in both hands, looking troubled as she glanced up at me. ]])

    MSG([[ I smiled back and bit into the dango; Akira followed suit. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0449.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"It’s delicious... even though it’s just cheap festival dango." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0730.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Hey now. You can’t say that in front of the shop staff, can you?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"W-Wow... I’m, I’m sorry." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0114.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female student】
"Haha! It’s okay~!" ]])

    MSG([[ But like Akira said, this dango isn’t ordinary festival quality. ]])

    MSG([[ Like the yakisoba and milk tea we had this morning, they must be using good ingredients. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0731.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"I always say Yuriai Private Academy is no ordinary school, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0732.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"This is just the beginning. Come on, let’s hit the next shop." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"F-fantastic~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Akira followed me, her mouth full of dango. ]])

    MSG([[ She looked tense in the unfamiliar crowd but seemed to manage okay. ]])
    --//BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    --//BU：アキラ（通常）、リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ On the fourth floor, we ran into Lira-san, who was recruiting for her class’s cosplay café. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0356.wav")

    MSG([[
【Lira】
"Erika, GGY. Who’s that? She kinda looks like you, is she a sister or something?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0733.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"She’s my cousin Akira. Look, it’s Lira-san, who I talk to often. Akira’s a big fan, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Uh, ah..." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira quickly hid behind me. Even though she admires her, flashy people still intimidate her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0357.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
"So your name’s Akira? I have a friend with that name, so I feel kinda close to you~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0358.wav")

    MSG([[
【Lira】
"Hey, late invite but after the school festival, wanna go karaoke together with Akira-chan? I wanna hear Erika’s enka after a long time." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0734.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"Sounds good. What do you think, Akira?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"No way no way no way no way snail... What kind of normie idea is that? To a fragile, socially awkward, toxic girl like me, that’s way too difficult." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0359.wav")

    MSG([[
【Lira】
"It’s—it’s okay. It’s good training to toughen your mental, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"Impossible. My mental state is not just fragile, it’s like okara—completely broken without even trying. Training is impossible." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0360.wav")

    MSG([[
【Lira】
"Ah, haha. Your personality and voice really do remind me of the Akira I know... Yeah, I get it, it’s scary if someone gets too close too suddenly." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0735.wav")

【Erika】
"Sorry for being so considerate, thanks." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0361.wav")

【Lira】

    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ After visiting various shops for a while, Akira said she was tired, so we decided to go up to the rooftop, which was open for attendees to take a break. ]])

    MSG([[ We sat together on a bench in a corner and looked up at the sky. ]])

    MSG([[ Today the autumn sky was perfectly clear and endless. The cool breeze blowing through the rooftop cooled our bodies, overheated from walking around. ]])

    MSG([[ Relaxing like this made me feel like I could forget all my worries. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0460.wav")

【Akira】
"School really is tough with so many people around." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0461.wav")
    MSG([[
【Akira】
"I’m about to collapse. Although I’m the one who ordered this, I wonder how Minato manages to live disguised like a girl." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0739.wav")
    MSG([[

【Erika】
"N-No, that’s not it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0742.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
"To some degree, everyone lives aware of the 'self others want to see.' In other words, an image." ]])

【Erika】

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0744.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
